Posts.Content: Hi GJP I had a mastectomy  & lymph nodes removed last July and started chemo in November, they discovered my cancer had turned to grade 3 during an oncotype dx test. I changed a lot of my products to non perfumed and did quite a bit of research.  Aveeno for moisturiser  but now I'm on Docetaxel I'm using udderly cream with extra urea, particularly on hands & feet, pitrok crystal roll on deodorant for women, made from pure natural  mineral salts, Jennifer Young Defiant Beauty Nail oil. Also, I changed to aloe dent toothpaste along with a soft brush. My oncologist has prescribed me various mouthwashes due to sore mouth on FEC.  Wishing you all the best on your recovery
Posts.Title: Post op deodaraunt !

Posts.Content: I'm sorry you find yourself here, it's not an easy time but you will get through this. I'm still on my chemo and have been recommended viscotears to use as and when my eyes become dry. I wish you well with your treatment x
